title: Sleek, Modern 1/1
posting_body: 9′ (or higher) ceilings throughout
Wood-vinyl plank flooring
Granite countertops in kitchens and bathrooms
Upscale stainless steel appliances
Designer plumbing fixtures
Contemporary cabinetry
Full size washers and dryers*
USB outlets
Luxury spa shower/tub combinations*
Private balconies and patios*
*In select homes
Hi, I’m Terra, an apartment locator and I love what I do!
I have been lucky enough to be in the Austin area most of my life.

Graduating from Lake Travis High School and attending college at Concordia University (when it was still in downtown Austin) gave me a first-hand view of living this eclectic, amazing lifestyle that Austin offers.
From inner city activities like live music, 9th street, SUP boards and shopping to lakeside luxuries like boating and water sports, I have seen it all.
Also, being a wife & mother of 3 has helped me discover the kid friendly side of Austin and surrounding areas.
I first received my Real Estate License in 2007 and love being able to help people, like you, discover the beauty that is Austin.
I’m detailed in my approach to help you find the best fit, in the least amount of time, and at the best price.
Many agents send a huge list of options and expect you to do the work.
The difference with me is that I do the work for you.
I’m here to guide you to your new home by listening to your wants, understanding your needs, and informing you of your options.
I know you are not just buying or renting a home, you’re creating a lifestyle.
My services and experience are completely free to you but, because I want to give you 100% of my time and attention, I do work by appointment only.
You may call, text or send an email to me with your name and what day and time works best for you.
Moving can be exciting and overwhelming so give me your stress, you stay excited, and I’ll take care of the rest.
*My contact info can be found in the reply tab above.
*Services Provided by Licensed Real Estate Agent with Nu Edge Realty.
*Pricing and availability are subject to change.
Terra Asher-Luongo
Licensed Agent
Appointment only: please call/text 8am - 6pm or email anytime
